import React , {useEffect} from 'react' import Message from '../components/Message' import {Link} from 'react-router-dom' import {Row,Col,Image,ListGroup,Button, Form,ListGroupItem, Card} from 'react-bootstrap' import {useDispatch, useSelector} from 'react-redux' import {addToCart, removeFromCart} from '../actions/cartActions' const CartPage = ({match, location, history}) => { //match:getting id, location: location.search for id?qty the "qty" part.Whatever after "?" history:redirect const productId = match.params.id const qty = location.search ? Number(location.search.split('=')[1]) : 1 //split: give us an array with 0 index of qty(of ?qty=5) and 1 index of 5. const dispatch = useDispatch() const cart = useSelector(state => state.cart) const {cartItems} = cart useEffect(()=>{ if(productId){ dispatch(addToCart(productId, qty)) } },[dispatch,productId,qty]) //if id or qty changes, causes useEffect changes. const removeFromCartHandler = (id)=>{ dispatch(removeFromCart(id)) } const checkOutHandler = () =>{ history.push('/login?redirect=shipping') } return (

Shopping Cart

{cartItems.length === 0 ? (Your Cart is empty!Go Back ) : ( {cartItems.map(item=> {item.name} ${item.price} dispatch(addToCart(item.productID, Number(e.target.value)))} > {[...Array(item.countInStock).keys()].map(x=>( ))} ) } ) }

Subtotal ({cartItems.reduce((acc,item)=>acc+ item.qty,0)}) items

${cartItems.reduce((acc,item)=>acc+ item.qty*item.price,0).toFixed(2)} ) } export default CartPage
